Join Today, Play Tomorrow
The Clubs of Sandestin
Imagine a place where every day feels like a getaway—where you can tee off on championship golf courses, rally on world-class tennis courts, stay active in a state-of-the-art fitness center, and enjoy exclusive social events with friends who feel like family. The Clubs of Sandestin offer all this and more, creating an unmatched lifestyle in the heart of paradise.
With six annual club memberships designed for a variety of interests, it’s never been easier to find the perfect fit for you and your family. Whether you're looking to elevate your game, unwind in a luxurious setting, or connect with an incredible community, Sandestin is where it all comes together.
We’ve even added new
onsite shipping services
—an exclusive amenity for guests, members, and employees—making it easy to send packages without ever leaving the resort.
Don’t just visit Sandestin—live it, experience it, and make it yours. Join today and unlock exclusive access, unforgettable moments, and a lifestyle that feels like a permanent vacation!
Elite Membership
The Sandestin Elite Membership provides an exclusive opportunity for Sandestin property owners, granting them privileged access to all five Sandestin clubs, including the Beach Club, Burnt Pine, Golf Club, Tennis Club, and Fitness Club. Embracing the Elite Membership of Sandestin unlocks the gateway to a lavish and well-rounded lifestyle.
LEARN MORE
Beach Club
Want to upgrade upgrade your beach experience? The Beach Club of Sandestin is exclusive to Sandestin Property Owners only. Membership grants you access to a private beach and heated swimming pool, beach amenities including chairs, umbrellas, cabanas, towel service and private member event privileges for your next event including weddings, birthday parties, and family reunions. Adding our private Beach Club of Sandestin to the equation makes a favorite experience even better.
Learn More
Burnt Pine Country Club
It’s the most heralded and breathtaking of Sandestin's four championship courses, and the unrivaled status and prestige of the Burnt Pine Country Club extends beyond the greens and fairways to include the coveted clubhouse and surrounding neighborhoods.
Unlimited access to the Burnt Pine Country Club, practice facility and PGA golf instruction, access to private club social events and the club's private fitness facility and special member rates at the Raven, Links and Baytowne courses. Membership definitely has its privileges.
LEARN MORE
Golf Club
When you love the game as much as you do, you’re serious about having the best golf experience wherever you go. At Sandestin, that means being a member of the Golf Club of Sandestin. Member benefits include unlimited access to Baytowne and The Links Golf Club (no greens fee) and the Raven ($10 greens fee). It also means special member cart fees, advanced registration privileges, access to exclusive member tournaments, and special member rates for PGA instruction, birdies not included. Now there’s even more to love.
Learn More
Tennis Club
Joining the Tennis Club of Sandestin is your ace. We’ve been voted one of the Top 3 clubs in tennis instruction along with a Top 25 ranking of U.S. Tennis Resorts. But the benefits don’t stop there — unlimited time on 12 HydroGrid clay courts and three hard courts, full access to clubhouse facilities, reduced rate lessons, and year-round activities including adult drill clinics. Get yourself on the court today. Call 850-267-8208 to become a member.
Learn More
Fitness Club
When fitness is a lifestyle, not an activity. Newly redesigned our fitness center includes cardio workout room, Nautilus exercise circuit, yoga, indoor cycling, Zumba, and special interest activities including a Running Club. It's all paired with full locker room privileges including a sauna and steam room. So whether you’re a fitness newbie or a triathlete, this is all the motivation you need.
Call 850-267-8208 for membership information.
Learn More
BE A PART OF THE SANDESTIN COMMUNITY

Ladies Tennis Team Challenge
When:
Monthly on the 25th All day until Sun, Nov 9 2025
Where:
Sandestin® Tennis Center
The ideal way to combine quality tennis with a memorable beach vacation, the Team Challenge is a series of team tennis events for women at various levels using the NTRP system. Every Ladies Team Challenge weekend features at least six teams in the event, with each team having a minimum of six ladies (three doubles teams). The format will be similar to a round-robin—your team will play against others entered in the event during the course of the weekend. The Team Challenge consists of two matches on both Friday and Saturday with the top qualifying matches on Sunday morning.

Ladies Tennis Team Challenge
Sandestin's Ladies Team Challenge Package includes:
Teams competing from around the Southeast
Room Accommodations
Continental Breakfast Daily
Tournament Luncheon on Friday
Exciting Matches throughout the Weekend
Discounts in Sandestin’s Tennis Shop
Team Photos & Tournament Raffle
Prizes/Awards to Winners & Finalists
Also, the Winning Team Receives a Complimentary 3 Bedroom, 3 Bath Condo to Defend Next Year’s Title!

April 25 - April 27 / Level 4.5
April 25 - April 27 / Level 7.5 Combo Event (4.0 & 3.5)

October 17 - October 19 / Level 8.5 Combo Event (4.5 & 4.0)
November 7 - November 9 / Level 3.5
Team spots are filling up – don’t miss the chance to bring your team to Sandestin for a weekend of Tennis, Beach, & Fun! Call David at (850) 267-7114 or email him at
[email protected]
to get your team signed up to play before it Sells Out!!

Resort Directory
Discover Sandestin Golf and Beach Resort®, a premier 2,400-acre destination in Northwest Florida. With 30 charming village neighborhoods offering various accommodations, seven miles of sugar-white beaches, championship golf courses, tennis courts, swimming pools, a marina, water sports, children's programs, and a vibrant pedestrian village with boutique shops, restaurants, nightclubs, and lively events, Sandestin® promises a one-of-a-kind vacation experience.
Sandestin Golf and Beach Resort
9300 Emerald Coast Pkwy W
Miramar Beach, FL 32550
Guest Assistance/Operator

Beach Services
With seven miles of powdery white sand, indulge in sun-soaked beach days, sandcastle-building, beach volleyball, and refreshing swims. Explore and enjoy our endless shoreline to the fullest.
850.267.8171 | 9am - 5pm Daily (seasonally, weather permitting)
LEARN MORE
Clubs of Sandestin
Embrace the spirit of community and camaraderie while celebrating life under the warm Sandestin® sun. Our resort, Sandestin Golf and Beach Resort®, offers five annual club memberships tailored to diverse activities and interests, ensuring you effortlessly find the perfect fit for you and your family.
850-267-8208
LEARN MORE
Baytowne Marina
Baytowne Marina, your one-stop full-service marina offering a variety of watercraft options, from fishing charters to boat rentals and more. Located conveniently next to our Village, it's your gateway to waterfront fun and adventures!
850.267.7773
LEARN MORE
Golf Courses
Discover the best in Florida golf with 73 holes across four championship courses, each designed by golfing legends Robert Trent Jones, Jr., Rees Jones, and Tom Jackson. Unparalleled challenges and rewards await at Sandestin, where our awards speak for themselves, and a day on our courses says even more.
Baytowne/Raven Golf Club
850-267-8155 | 7am - 6pm Daily
Burnt Pine Golf Club
850-267-6500 | 7am - 6pm Daily
The Links Golf Club
850-267-8144 | 7:30am - 5pm Daily
LEARN MORE
Sandestin Rental Management
Choose Sandestin® Rental Management for more than just our top position on the Emerald Coast. We invest in you, handling marketing, maintenance, and management of your property, so you can focus on what matters most.
850-267-4389
LEARN MORE
Sandestin Real Estate
With a team of 16 seasoned sales professionals, Sandestin Real Estate consistently ranks as a top-performing brokerage on the Emerald Coast, delivering exceptional results both within the resort's gates and in the surrounding areas.
850.267.8100
LEARN MORE
Recreation
Embrace a world of possibilities: watersports, bike rides, fishing, paddleboarding—your day is wide open. With our expansive 2,400-acre resort, boundless bay, and endless beaches, each corner promises a new and exciting adventure for you to explore.
850.267.7000
LEARN MORE
Fitness Center
Enjoy everything you need for your fitness regime, including Cardio Theater entertainment and stunning bay views. Lockers, showers, sauna, and steam room are at your disposal. Motivation? It's all up to you!
850.267.6464
7am - 6pm | Monday - Friday
7am - 5pm | Saturday
7am - 1pm | Sunday
LEARN MORE
Tennis Center
Discover the finest tennis experience in Northwest Florida! With 12 world-class HydroGrid clay and three hard tennis courts, plus six pickleball courts, we offer private lessons, a top-ranked Junior Tennis program, and fun Round Robin tournaments for all skill levels.
850.267.7060
LEARN MORE
Group Sales / Meetings
Experience flawless meetings and events at Sandestin. Our beautiful indoor and outdoor venues span 85,000 square feet, accommodating gatherings from 10 to 1,600 attendees. Delight your guests with delectable meals, fun team activities, and unforgettable moments. Sandestin has it all to exceed your expectations.
850.267.8159
LEARN MORE
Weddings at Sandestin
Unveil your dream event at Sandestin—an enchanting destination with glistening sands, emerald waters, and a plethora of amenities. From exquisite venues and attentive wedding coordinators to pampering spa services and championship golf, we offer everything you need to craft an unforgettable experience for you and your guests.
850-267-7579
LEARN MORE
The Village of Baytowne Wharf
The Village of Baytowne Wharf, a vibrant gathering place featuring an array of specialty stores, acclaimed restaurants, captivating art galleries, thrilling nightlife, and an exciting lineup of festivals and events. It's the bustling hub where everyone wants to be. During the day, enjoy zip-lining, carousel rides, and shopping for fashion-forward attire or premium fishing gear. As the sun sets, delight in dining at top-notch restaurants or venture out for a night of fun in (Bay)towne!
850.267.8180
LEARN MORE
Marina Bar & Grill
Marina Bar & Grill is known for its inviting community with captivating bay views and our beloved macaw, Mary-Ann. Unwind with loved ones over ice-cold beers and delectable offerings, sharing fishing tales long after your adventure.
850.267.7778 | 11am - 10pm Daily
LEARN MORE
Fat Tuesday Daiquiri Bar
Indulge in the finest New Orleans daiquiris and frozen drinks at Fat Tuesday Daiquiri Bar, nestled in The Village of Baytowne Wharf. Savor frozen delights like the 190 Octane or the Hurricane, meticulously blended and chilled to refresh you under the summer sun.
850.351.1809
3pm - 11 pm | Sunday - Thursday
3pm - 12am | Friday
12pm - 12am | Saturday

It's the bustling hub where everyone wants to be. During the day, enjoy zip-lining, carousel rides, and shopping for fashion-forward attire or premium fishing gear. As the sun sets, delight in dining at top-notch restaurants or venture out for a night of fun in (Bay)towne!
850.267.8180
LEARN MORE
Marina Bar & Grill
Marina Bar & Grill is known for its inviting community with captivating bay views and our beloved macaw, Mary-Ann. Unwind with loved ones over ice-cold beers and delectable offerings, sharing fishing tales long after your adventure.
850.267.7778 | 11am - 10pm Daily
LEARN MORE
Fat Tuesday Daiquiri Bar
Indulge in the finest New Orleans daiquiris and frozen drinks at Fat Tuesday Daiquiri Bar, nestled in The Village of Baytowne Wharf. Savor frozen delights like the 190 Octane or the Hurricane, meticulously blended and chilled to refresh you under the summer sun.
850.351.1809
3pm - 11 pm | Sunday - Thursday
3pm - 12am | Friday
12pm - 12am | Saturday

Sandestin Careers
The magic of Sandestin begins with our staff. Whether you are thinking of changing careers or you have heard our name and want to find out what the buzz is all about, we just might have the perfect opportunity at our resort for you to excel in the hospitality industry.

EMPLOYEE HOUSING
EMPLOYEE BENEFITS
Medical Coverage
At Sandestin, we value your well-being, offering extensive medical coverage for you and your family. Recognizing diverse healthcare needs, we provide a variety of options tailored to your individual situation.
LEARN MORE
Bereavement Leave
Full-time, year-round employees who experience a death in their immediate family are eligible for up to five days of paid leave. Immediate family members include: spouse, child, parent, stepchild, stepparent, sibling, stepsibling, parent-in-law, sibling-in-law, grandparent, grandchild, and domestic partners or significant others. Payment is based on eight hours per day at straight-time rates.
In addition we will grant time off for the loss of a family pet. In this circumstance, time off will be granted, and PTO should be used.
Paid Parental Leave
We prioritize our employees', recognizing the importance of supporting significant life moments. We're dedicated to assisting you throughout the journey of welcoming a new addition to your family. Our paid paternal leave of 4 weeks is available to full-time employees with at least one year of tenure, allowing you to bond with your newborn or newly adopted child without financial strain.
Sabbatical Leave for Executives
Recognizing the importance of fostering leadership and innovation, Sandestin Investments, LLC aims to promote creativity among its employees. The company policy allows eligible employees to take paid sabbatical leave for a designated period to focus on self-development. Exempt-level professionals at the Executive or Director level may request sabbatical leave after completing three years of continuous employment.
401(k) Plan
We prioritize employees' financial well-being and offer a robust 401(k) retirement plan. We match 50% of contributions up to 6% of salary to support retirement goals and provide valuable tax benefits
Spot Pet Insurance
Pet insurance is for paw-rents seeking a financial safety net for accidents or illnesses that their pets might experience in the future. Spot Pet Insurance covers things like Vet exams, dental care, x-rays, tests emergencies and hospitalizations along with much more.
Rocket Lawyer
To help you with major life changes and other legal needs, all active Sandestin employees have access to a legal documents library, Attorney Q&A, Attorney phone consultation and local discounts through Rocket Lawyer.
Sketchers Direct Partnership
SDI employees are eligible for a 30% discount on all work styles year round through our partnership with Skechers Direct, as well as quarterly Friends and Family events that provide exclusive discounts on more than 3,000 Skechers styles.
LifeMart by ADP
Here at SDI, we have partnered with LifeMart by ADP, where you’ll have access to exclusive savings on movies, concerts, sporting events, theme parks, travel, electronics & more.
Recognition & Rewards with Kudos
Great work deserves a spotlight! Our Kudos platform makes it easy to recognize one another and turn appreciation into real rewards.
Sandestin Employee Amenities
Sandestin Investments, LLC extends special discounts and amenity privileges to all active employees as a benefit. These may change at any time without notice.
Golf
Links and Baytowne $22 per person
Raven $37 per person
Employees utilizing golf facilities must adhere to course rules, golf etiquette, and regulations, including the dress code and the ban of personal coolers. Each employee may invite up to three guests. Employee rounds are subject to availability during non-peak times. Tee times for employees can be booked the day before play after 3:00 PM or on the day of play. Sandestin employees are not required to play with their guests, but they must arrange the tee time and be present at check-in. All golf carts must be off the course by sunset.
Tennis
Tennis is complimentary for active employees based on same day reservations and court availability. Pickle Ball is $5 per person per hour and is based on availability of courts.
Food & Beverage
At the Marina Bar and Grill, active SDI employees and their accompanied guests can enjoy a 25% discount, while at Fat Tuesdays, they receive a 10% discount. Additionally, there's a 20% discount available at all Golf Course Turns. Employees are kindly reminded to avoid occupying premium seating during busy periods. Numerous restaurants in Baytowne Wharf extend Sandestin employee discounts.
Please be aware that there are no discounts for alcohol purchases. Furthermore, in accordance with Florida State Law, individuals must be 21 years of age or older to purchase or consume alcohol, and this should only be done while off duty.
Guest Room Rates
Employees receive a 50% discount off rack rate (no resort fee or cleaning fee) and are now able to book their employee reservations on our website. Restrictions and Black-out dates apply. Your guest will need to present an Employee Reservation Form upon check-in. This along with other information on the process is available in Human Resources.
Health + Fitness Center
Become a member of the Fitness Center at Sandestin. Employee Only - $12.50/ per pay period Employee + Spouse - $20/ per pay period Additional family members - $8 per person/per pay period No children under age 16. Children under the age of 18 must be accompanied by an adult. Rates paid through payroll deduction only
Bike Rentals
Bike rentals are complimentary for employees on an hourly basis during the spring/summer season and for employee and their immediate family members during the off season. Reservations must be made on the same day of use and is subject to availability. Bikes are located by the Marina.
Dunes Putting Course
Putt Putt course is available on a complimentary basis during normal hours of operations on a space availability basis. This is for employees and their immediate family.
Kayak Rental
Kayaks are available at the Marina Hut for use in the Bay for employees only, on a complimentary basis. Based on availability for same day use.
Bonfires
Employees receive a 15% discount on Bonfires located at Marina Beach. Employees need to call the Bonfire Booking number (850) 267-7777 to book.
Fishing + Pool Access
Fishing in the lakes on property is not permitted unless the employee is a resident of Sandestin. All employees may fish from the Choctawhatchee Bay.
Pool Access may only be used by members of the Sandestin Owners Club, guests and homeowners.

Golf Memberships
With four different clubs waiting for you to tee up, Sandestin caters to all types of golfers, from the seasoned pro to the first timer. From members-only to open membership clubs, the right fit for you and your family is just a swing away.
Golf Club of Sandestin
If you love the game—and we mean really love the game—the Golf Club of Sandestin will feel like paradise. Member benefits include unlimited access to our championship Baytowne, The Links Golf Club, and Raven courses, member cart fees, special guest green fees, advanced registration privileges, access to exclusive member tournaments and exclusive offerings at resort golf shops, charge privileges at all courses, and special member rates for PGA instruction.

About Us
The ultimate destination, your place in the sun. The award-winning Sandestin Golf and Beach Resort® has been a favorite for generations of families and coastal adventurers who come back year after year.
Book Now
Our Story
Our beautiful natural setting is certainly one of the reasons why people have been drawn to our beloved Emerald Coast for decades. Stunning powder-white sand beach, towering oaks, abundant wildlife. A forest by the sea. But it’s really our community’s welcoming spirit. This special place that is deeply rooted in community, values, and genuine southern hospitality. This place where days are full and favorite memories are made.
Welcome
Rental Management
Your investment is our investment. Our qualified, caring team is poised to assist with monitoring revenue earnings, completing property improvements, and sharing special added touches such as resort amenities and get togethers. We market, maintain, and manage your property so you can spend your time doing what’s most important to you.
Choose The Experts
Sandestin Real Estate
So you’ve fallen in love with Sandestin and you want to come play with us … forever. Looking to buy or sell property in the Sandestin, Destin, and 30A areas? Sandestin Real Estate puts their experience and local knowledge to work for you, from start to finish, with expert sales professionals, and a strong support team.
Start Your Search
Sandestin Living
Sandestin Living is SRE's lifestyle and real estate magazine focusing on Sandestin Golf and Beach Resort. Published two times per year, we fill the magazine with human interest stories, lifestyle articles, real estate market inventory and activity reports, and keep the people who love Sandestin up to date with all of its happenings throughout the year.
READ THE LATEST ISSUE HERE!
Dogs Welcome
At Sandestin Golf and Beach Resort, your four-legged family members can join you on vacation. With tons of walking trails and miles of sugar sand beaches, there are many options to explore to keep you, and fido entertained. We've even created a special place for your to special family member! Our bark park is a safe, clean environment located near the Treehouse between the Village of Baytowne Wharf and the Baytowne Marina.
PLEASE NOTE: Not all units at Sandestin® are pet friendly. To reserve a pet friendly unit during your stay, please contact our reservations team at 866-701-3720.
Sandestin Foundation for Kids
What if you could give hope. Change lives. Make a meaningful and positive difference in children’s lives. At the Sandestin Foundation for Kids, that’s our mission. We not only help children here in our community, but abroad. From supporting a local family after a tragedy to drilling wells in Africa, we want to provide a brighter, better future for children in need of help and hope.
Learn More
Clubs & Memberships
We would call ourselves exclusive, but we’re far from it. True, we have six different clubs that cater to different interests. The common thread?  The desire to bond our tight community, create camaraderie, and celebrate that special Sandestin® way of life. We’re social. We’re active. And we bask under the warm Florida sun. Join us.
Find Your Membership
Winter Guests
When you want to get away from cold winter weather, Sandestin gives you so much to escape to. Special value-added packages, extended stay rates, and a whole slate of fun snowbird activities.
Your Place In The Sun
What Our Guests Are Saying
Great stay!
"Had a great weekend get-away with my girlfriend. Went to the beach club and enjoyed the beach front view. It was my girlfriend an I first time in Destin and would definitely go back. I will be going back."
Timothy R.
Excellent!
"We want to move to Florida now because of how great of a time we had! The Sandestin Resort was phenomenal! Go to the beach for a while, then the pool or kayaking and then enjoy the family friendly nightlife in the Baytowne Warf! It was all perfect! We cannot wait to get back to Destin for more fun!"
B. Taylor
Family trip to Sandestin
"I recently had the pleasure to stay at the Sandestin Golf and Beach Resort. The amenities the resort offers are second to none. The amount of food options, activities for the kids and overall fun experiences for the whole family are plentiful. We stayed in a 4 bedroom unit at Villa Lago on property and the unit was amazing. I highly recommend this property if you’re looking for a family friendly place that has it all. Can’t say enough about the property, it’s staff and amenities!!"
TripAdvisor Guest
Amazing getaway!
"This place is amazing. The view from our balcony over the Bay was such a beautiful sight at night. The room was very spacious. We're got in late so we didn't get to take advantage of all that this place has to offer but we will definitely be back for a longer stay."
TripAdvisor Guest
Awesome Resort and Tennis
"The Sandestin Resort is awesome! There are plenty of housing options that are safe, clean, spacious, nicely appointed and very convenient to everything! The tennis facility and staff are great! The staff conducts excellent drills and round robins that are state of the art instruction and appropriate for any playing level. Absolutely awesome tennis experience on well maintained clay courts!"
Lavonne W.
Best Family Vacay
"Our family has had the best experience at Sandestin Golf and Beach Resort. A beautiful resort and great staff - A big thank you to Brock Ellis for being so helpful and wonderful!!"
Hunter and Molly Warren

The Elite Membership of Sandestin

Elite Membership
The Sandestin Elite Membership is exclusive to Sandestin property owners and offers an exclusive experience with access to all five Sandestin clubs to include: Beach Club, Burnt Pine, Golf Club, Tennis Club, and Fitness Club. The Elite Membership of Sandestin is the key to a well-rounded, luxurious lifestyle within the gates of Sandestin.
Beach Club
At the Beach Club, bask in the beauty of a private beach, a heated pool, and a full range of amenities. The experience also includes elevated food & beverage offerings, hosting private events, luxury relaxation spaces, inspirational club nights, live entertainment and more!
LEARN MORE
Burnt Pine
For golf enthusiasts, Burnt Pine is a paradise offering exclusive access to the Burnt Pine Golf Club, special rates at neighboring clubs, priority tee times, delicious club nights, private events and more!
LEARN MORE
Golf Club
The Golf Club of Sandestin ensures unlimited access to courses, advance reservations, exclusive tournaments, and significant savings, plus it offers PGA instruction at special member rates.
LEARN MORE
Tennis Club
Tennis lovers will find their haven at the Tennis Club with unlimited court access, reduced-rate lessons, and a 20% pro-shop discount, while pickleball courts add versatility and access to America’s fastest growing sport.
LEARN MORE
Fitness Club
The Fitness Club provides a holistic wellness experience with its top-notch equipment, group exercise options, certified personal trainers, and relaxing amenities.
LEARN MORE
